revised_title: Vacuum Ultra-Violet Absorption Spectra of Carbon Dioxide and Carbon Oxysulphide
tldr: The authors investigated the absorption spectra of carbon dioxide and carbon oxysulphide in the vacuum ultra-violet region. They discovered new electronic transitions and analyzed the bands in the spectra, providing insights into the molecular structure and ionization potentials of these molecules. Their findings contribute to the understanding of the electronic states and transitions in these compounds.
